title: Boutique Colorado Rocky Mountain Escape with Stylish Rooftop & Onsite Taproom
description:
Outdoor adventures, acclaimed craft beer and a breathtaking location at the base of the Rocky Mountains, The Eddy Taproom & Hotel offers an exceptional escape for gourmands and adventurists seeking an inviting atmosphere amid Coloradoâ€™s picturesque scenery.

Designed for the modern explorer, this boutique hotel features 49 artistically styled rooms. Spend fun-filled days hiking and e-biking through the surrounding landscape, then celebrate your efforts at this trendy retreat. Tuck into a mouthwatering BBQ feast at Truck Eddy, sip a hand-crafted cocktail or signature beer at the onsite taproom or bask in the glow of a fire pit on the private rooftop, where sweeping mountain sunsets await.
